Name: Caffè Americano
Description: Espresso shots topped with hot water for a rich, bold taste.

Name: Cappuccino
Description: Espresso with steamed milk, finished with a thick layer of foam.

Name: Iced Shaken Espresso
Description: Espresso shaken with ice and a touch of sweetness, smooth and refreshing.

Name: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
Description: Cold brew coffee with house-made vanilla sweet cream.

Name: Caramel Macchiato
Description: Espresso combined with vanilla syrup, steamed milk, topped with caramel drizzle.

Name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
Description: Espresso with steamed milk and fall spices: pumpkin, cinnamon, nutmeg, clove.

Name: Matcha Green Tea Latte
Description: Smooth matcha green tea blended with steamed milk for a creamy taste.

Name: Chai Latte
Description: Black tea infused with cinnamon, clove, and spices blended with steamed milk.

Name: Mocha Frappuccino®
Description: Coffee blended with mocha sauce and ice, topped with whipped cream.

Name: Caramel Frappuccino®
Description: Coffee blended with caramel syrup and ice, finished with whipped cream & drizzle.

Name: Nitro Cold Brew
Description: Cold brew coffee infused with nitrogen for a smooth and creamy texture.

Name: Flat White
Description: Ristretto shots of espresso with steamed milk for a velvety, rich flavor.

Name: Iced Mango Dragonfruit Refresher™
Description: A vibrant blend of sweet mango and dragonfruit flavors shaken with ice.

Name: Strawberries & Crème Frappuccino®
Description: A blend of ice, milk and strawberry purée topped with whipped cream.
